abstract: Goldman Sachs employees will have to wait a little longer to enjoy the culinary creations of Francois Payard, the award-winning pastry chef whose new bakery sits in the base of Goldman's 200 West Street headquarters. Mr. Payard has had to postpone his grand opening because the firm has not yet installed a phone line for him. "It's a disgrace," Mr. Payard said of his landlord's dilly-dallying.

Mr. Payard has had to postpone his grand opening because the firm has not yet installed a phone line for him. "It's a disgrace," Mr. Payard said of his landlord's dilly-dallying. Read more »

headline.main: Goldman Keeps This Bakery From Making Dough
